interface.name: org.freedesktop.NetworkManager.Connection.Active
interface.tp:docstring: Objects that implement the Connection.Active interface represent an attempt to connect to a network using the details provided by a Connection object. The Connection.Active object tracks the life-cycle of the connection attempt and if successful indicates whether the connected network is the "default" or preferred network for access.

property.name: SpecificObject
property.tp:docstring: A specific object associated with the active connection. This property reflects the specific object used during connection activation, and will not change over the lifetime of the ActiveConnection once set.

property.name: Id
property.tp:docstring: The ID of the connection, provided as a convenience so that clients do not have to retrieve all connection details.

property.name: Uuid
property.tp:docstring: The UUID of the connection, provided as a convenience so that clients do not have to retrieve all connection details.

property.name: Type
property.tp:docstring: The type of the connection, provided as a convenience so that clients do not have to retrieve all connection details.

property.name: Devices
property.tp:docstring: Array of object paths representing devices which are part of this active connection.

property.name: State
property.tp:docstring: The state of this active connection.

property.name: Default
property.tp:docstring: Whether this active connection is the default IPv4 connection, i.e. whether it currently owns the default IPv4 route.

property.name: Ip4Config
property.tp:docstring: Object path of the Ip4Config object describing the configuration of the connection. Only valid when the connection is in the NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_ACTIVATED state.

property.name: Dhcp4Config
property.tp:docstring: Object path of the Dhcp4Config object describing the DHCP options returned by the DHCP server (assuming the connection used DHCP). Only valid when the connection is in the NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_ACTIVATED state.

property.name: Default6
property.tp:docstring: Whether this active connection is the default IPv6 connection, i.e. whether it currently owns the default IPv6 route.

property.name: Ip6Config
property.tp:docstring: Object path of the Ip6Config object describing the configuration of the connection. Only valid when the connection is in the NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_ACTIVATED state.

property.name: Dhcp6Config
property.tp:docstring: Object path of the Dhcp6Config object describing the DHCP options returned by the DHCP server (assuming the connection used DHCP). Only valid when the connection is in the NM_ACTIVE_CONNECTION_STATE_ACTIVATED state.

property.name: Vpn
property.tp:docstring: Whether this active connection is also a VPN connection.

property.name: Master
property.tp:docstring: The path to the master device if the connection is a slave.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values

tp:enumvalue.tp:docstring: The active connection is in an unknown state.
The connection is being torn down and cleaned up.
The connection is no longer active.
